CustomField.description: Maximum number of parallel workers for bulk execution operations. This soft limit prevents database row-locking contention and API rate limiting while allowing administrators to control concurrency safely. The system uses a hybrid cap calculation: min(BulkConcurrencyLimit, available queueable slots, actual records to process).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls bulk execution concurrency. Higher values increase throughput but may cause row-locking issues. Lower values are safer but may reduce performance. Recommended: 5-15 for most orgs.
CustomField.label: Bulk Concurrency Limit
